mapper.select: select t.id as templateId, t.name as templateName, t.description as templateDescription, t.type as templateType, tttn.id as templateTaskTreeNodeId, tttn.type, ttp.id as templateTaskPhaseId, ttp.title as templateTaskPhaseTitle, ttp.description as templateTaskPhaseDescription, ttp.reserve_content as templateTaskPhaseReserveContent, ttp.rank as templateTaskPhaseReserveRank, ttp.is_duped as templateTaskPhaseIsDuped, tts.id as templateTaskScheduleId, tts.title as templateTaskScheduleTitle, tts.owner as templateTaskScheduleOwner, tts.watcher as templateTaskScheduleWatcher, tts.ddl as templateTaskScheduleDdl, tts.is_milestone as templateTaskScheduleIsMileStone, tts.is_must as templateTaskScheduleIsMust, tts.set_field as templateTaskScheduleSetField, tts.pre_task as templateTaskSchedulePreTask, tts.rank as templateTaskScheduleRank from template t left join template_task_tree_node tttn on t.template_task_tree_node_id = tttn.id left join template_task_phase ttp on tttn.template_task_phase_id = ttp.id and tttn.type=1 left join template_task_schedule tts on tttn.template_task_schedule_id = tts.id and tttn.type=0 where t.id = #{id}
